name: reaper
description: Claude Code configuration, documentation, and customizations for Spice Labs.

scripts.test: node --test scripts/build.test.js scripts/commitlint.test.js scripts/panel-selection-keywords.test.js scripts/visual-vocabulary.test.js scripts/contracts.test.js
scripts.test:coverage: node --test --experimental-test-coverage --test-coverage-lines=70 --test-coverage-branches=70 --test-coverage-functions=70 scripts/build.test.js scripts/commitlint.test.js scripts/panel-selection-keywords.test.js scripts/visual-vocabulary.test.js scripts/contracts.test.js
